summary: Romantic Valentine’s Day personal gift website with wine red/creamy white/gold palette, elegant typography, soft animations, and multiple themed sections (hero, love letter, memories, reasons, closing quote).
architectural_notes: Use deep wine red, soft creamy white, and subtle gold accents as the core color palette.
Alternate section backgrounds (creamy white vs wine red) with soft gradients and subtle heart/rose patterning; use rounded cards for content blocks.
Typography direction: romantic script/serif for headings and clean readable font for body copy.
Keep interactions/animations gentle (fade-ins, soft transitions) to maintain an intimate, luxurious mood.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Subtle seamless heart pattern overlay, wine-red on transparent (valentine-pattern-wine.dim_1600x1600.png)
- Subtle seamless heart pattern overlay, creamy-white on transparent (valentine-pattern-cream.dim_1600x1600.png)
- Minimal romantic icon set in subtle gold (heart, rose, star) on transparent (valentine-icons-gold.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page Valentine’s Day website with a warm, intimate, luxurious look using a deep wine red + soft creamy white palette with subtle gold accents, and apply the styling consistently across all sections.

Implement the page structure with these sections in order: (1) Hero with title “To the Love of My Life” and a short romantic subtitle, (2) Love Letter editable area for a personal message, (3) Memories section with cards, (4) “Reasons I Love You” section with romantic text and/or icons (hearts/roses/stars), (5) Final closing section with a sweet Valentine’s message/quote that ends with the exact text “by vkayyy”.

Add elegant, romantic typography: use a script or serif font for headings and a clean, readable font for body text, including consistent heading hierarchy (H1/H2/H3) and comfortable line-height for long-form reading in the love letter.

Style the background so that sections alternate between creamy white and wine red, including soft gradients, subtle heart/rose pattern overlays, and rounded cards for content blocks (love letter, memory cards, reasons cards).
Implement smooth, soft animations across the site: gentle fade-ins on section entry (e.g., on scroll into view), and subtle hover/focus transitions for interactive elements (buttons, cards, inputs).

Make the Love Letter section editable with an on-page text editor (e.g., textarea) and a styled preview area that renders the message in the site’s typography. Provide a one-click “Copy letter” control that copies the current letter text to the clipboard.

Implement the Memories section as a grid of editable cards where the user can add/update content and easily paste/copy: allow adding a memory title + description, support pasting an image from the clipboard into a memory card (when the browser provides an image), and provide a “Copy” action per memory card to copy its text content (title + description).

Create a “Reasons I Love You” section with romantic text items and decorative icons (hearts, roses, stars) styled in the site palette (including subtle gold accents), displayed as a responsive set of rounded cards or list items.

Add required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI for subtle background pattern overlays and romantic decorative accents (without routing images through the backend).
